Description: Two joining body sherds from the neck of an Egyptian wheel-made jar, decorated with a white slip and a black horizontal line, on top of that parallel vertical lines in a length of 2.5 directly at the neck, 18th Dyn?. Max. Diameter roughly 20cm, neck 12-14 cm.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E13.2Q, unstratified, 4 8-9 NK
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
